snippet: Donald Trump, Senator Ted Cruz, Sarah Palin, the radio host Mark Levin and a host of other conservative luminaries headed to the Capitol to air their grievances against the Iran nuclear deal.
abstract: Donald Trump, Senator Ted Cruz, Sarah Palin, the radio host Mark Levin and a host of other conservative luminaries headed to the Capitol to air their grievances against the Iran nuclear deal.

headline.main: Donald Trump Brings Theatrics to Iran Nuclear Deal Protest
